text: Teresa Stratas (born May 26, 1938) is a Canadian soprano opera singer and actress. She was born in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Stratas has won 3 Grammy Awards and been nominated for a Tony Award ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Toronto Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Musical theater actors Category:North American opera singers Category:Sopranos Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Canadian Grammy Award winners
title: Teresa Stratas
